body: This is a VSCode git-commit snippets file. There are 2 install methods.
1. (Windows) If it is placed in the ~/AppData/Roaming/Code/User/snippets/ folder, these snippets will be available.

2. Copy and paste any or all of the snippets below into your VSCode's git-commit snippets file: Go to File -> Preferences -> User Snippets, type in git-commit, then paste them inside of the file between the top `{` and the bottom curly bracket `}`.
README.description: Tells you how to install this file.

Git Commit Template.description: Start a commit message with relevant details.

Git Commit Header.description: Creates a git commit header template.

Git Commit Footer (Addresses Issue).description: Addresses (or references) to a particular issue.
